remoteClasses.name: RtpEndpoint
remoteClasses.doc: Endpoint that provides bidirectional content delivery capabilities with remote networked peers through RTP protocol. An :rom:cls:`RtpEndpoint` contains paired sink and source :rom:cls:`MediaPad` for audio and video.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the endpoint belongs

events.name: OnKeySoftLimit
events.doc: Emitted when encryption is used and any stream reached the soft key usage limit and will expire soon.

complexTypes.name: CryptoSuite
complexTypes.doc: Describes the encryption and authentication algorithms

properties.name: key
properties.doc: The cryptographic master key. It should be 30 bytes length when AES_128_CM cipher is used or 46 bytes length for AES_256_CM cipher), If no key is provided a random one will be used
